name: Tron Patrol
description:
Tron Patrol is a spin on the 1978 game Rocket Patrol made for the APF-MP1000. In this game, you must destroy the other light cycles by cutting them off and destroying them for points. Be careful not to crash into the enemy light cycles as you will instead lose points. Aim for the highscore!

This game was made using the Phaser3 engine for a college project. All art, music, and sound effects were created by me.
